trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Carrollton
There were no other sightings in Carrollton on or around November 14th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend and I were driving west on the way home from work. We were drivingaway from the Addison Airport. It was in the afternoon and we spotted astar-like object in the sky witch we both thought was a star at first. I justthought that it was a bright star and since it was so bright you could see it inthe after noon. We just kept on starring at it except for me because I wasdriving, I tryed to keep looking up at it to figure out what it was after about5 minutes it just slowly vanished. Thats when we new it wasnt a star.
